hercpanorama 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Pivot and split assessment fields with time and context data in the column name

wrangle_panorama_fields.Rd

Pivot and split assessment fields with time and context data in the column name

Usage

wrangle_panorama_fields(.panorama_data, .patterns)

Arguments

.panorama_data

a "Data" item from running batch_import_raw_reports()

.patterns

a vector of at least some named regular expressions, a la tidyr::separate_wider_regex()

Value

a tibble with four columns: School, Student Student Number, Field, and Observation.
